metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12713 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: GIMP through 2.10.2 makes g_get_tmp_dir calls to establish temporary filenames, which may result in a filename that already exists, as demonstrated by the gimp_write_and_read_file function in app/tests/test-xcf.c. This might be leveraged by attackers to overwrite files or read file content that was intended to be private.

notes.Note: alexmurray> This code is part of the unit tests for gimp which are not distributed in Ubuntu

criterions.comment: gimp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
